data.title: LinkedIn
data.meta_description: Tokheim | 16,438 followers on LinkedIn. We are enabling the evolution of the consumer experience in fueling and charging, as part of DFS. | Tokheim was founded in 1898 in Cedar Rapids, Iowa and now its renowned Quantium dispenser line and technology solutions are sold in over 160 countries worldwide. Over the years, Tokheim has made history by revolutionizing the industry, building a legacy of unrelenting innovation and unparalleled quality. A legacy that now continues to thrive through Dover Fueling Solutions and the Dover Corporation (NYSE: DOV).
data.text:
Check out the amazing ProGauge Automatic Tank Gauging (ATG) portfolio! 😍 Our company offers a wide range of #ATG products that are leading the industry, including top-of-the-line tank gauges, advanced probes, and top-notch tank calibration services. Learn more about our products at: 🔗 https://brnw.ch/21wLYlG #Consoles #Probes #ProGauge

Join us for our latest episode, 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗘𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝗪𝗲𝘁𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗰𝗸 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁, featuring Fergus Heading and Tim Firkins. 🎙️ Together, we dive into the true definition of #WetstockManagement and how it can enhance the success of fuel retailers. We also discuss the potential consequences of neglecting wetstock management in a fuel retail business. Tune in on Spotify ➡️ https://brnw.ch/21wLSXm #FuelingTheConversation #DFS

Are you struggling to find a #PaymentTerminal that's easy-to-use, and is also attractive in the eye of the consumer? 👀 Consider the Tokheim Crypto VGA® OPT (Outdoor Payment Terminal). 😉 #Payment #SecurePayment #FuelRetail

👁️🗨️ 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝘂𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀: The ProGauge 3D Laser Scan Automatic Tank Calibration . “With over 50 tank scans completed over a four-year period, the 3D Laser Scan has proven to be invaluable in supplying accurate data to enable Z Energy to recalibrate tank gauging and create new dip sticks for our tank relining projects.” – Neil Moon, Z Energy Network Engineering manager Read the full case study at: ➡️ https://brnw.ch/21wLxZU

Are you struggling to choose a podcast for your upcoming summer vacation? 🤷♂️🎧 Whether you'll be stuck in a plane or car seat, Dover Fueling Solutions® has the perfect solution for you! Our 𝗙𝘂𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗽𝗼𝗱𝗰𝗮𝘀𝘁 covers diverse topics such as payment, clean energy, and fuel dispensers. Give it a listen and follow our page to stay updated on new episodes: 🔗 https://brnw.ch/21wLubM Have a great summer! 🌞 #FuelingTheConversation #DFS #Podcast

Experience the best, experience the ProGauge MagLink LX Plus console. In this video, explore its top features such as: 🔍 User-friendly interface with intelligent ‘touch and swipe’ navigation. 🔍 Can monitor manifolded or grouped tanks. 🔍 Leak detection scheduling by day/week/month. #Consoles #ProGauge #DFS

Are you curious about what it takes to be a strong leader in a male-dominated industry? Kendra Keller, Vice President and General Manager at Dover Fueling Solutions®, offers valuable insights on the topic. Listen to her interview here: 🎧 https://brnw.ch/21wLo0v #FuelingTheConversation #DFSUserConferenceSeries

Are you concerned your fuel stock level readings may not be an accurate reflection of what is truly happening underground? 😬 If so, we have a solution for you - 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗚𝗮𝘂𝗴𝗲 𝟯𝗗 𝗟𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝗧𝗮𝗻𝗸 𝗖𝗮𝗹𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻. This solution uses state-of-the-art technology to accurately determine the exact volume of liquid in fuel tanks, producing a detailed representation of the inside of any underground tank, regardless of the presence of any flammable liquids or vapours. Learn more about the 3D Laser Scan at: 🔗 https://lnkd.in/eR6GE589 #TankGauging #ATG

Tokheim OASE™ (Online Authorisation and Switching Environment) handles 806 million transactions annually for oil companies, wholesaler groups and independent dealers. 💡 The highly secure online solution allows transactions to be authorized quickly and securely to help you offer your customers a better service. Now, are you ready to let Tokheim OASE™ handle your transactions? 😏 #Payment #SecurePayment #FuelRetail
